text: Since I was invited to the "One-Way Road" forum starting from tomorrow, I will go to Beijing from today. The secretary general of the second floor will go and suddenly began to pay attention to Japan. I welcome the second floor visit. As an advisory committee of AIIB, I hope that Japan will decide to participate in AIIB as well.

At the "One-Way Road" forum, the organizer has asked two speech. I am planning to speak of Japanese AIIB participation in my opinion and a project to connect Asia with a transmission network of renewable energy. Cooperation between Japan and China will lead the world to prosperity and peace.
